Midwest Food Bank provides approximately 4,320 pounds of non refrigerated items at no expense.  Riverbend Food Bank provided 20,360 pounds of  fresh produce and groceries this year at a cost to us for $1,646.56.  AMAZING GRACE!!!", "notes": "Do you need us to delivery food items to you?      Let us serve you.
